body:
## Release Notes

- Add test for scroll-down on resize. @iphydf (#364)
- Add some UI integration tests (end-to-end). @iphydf (#360)
- Update github actions. @iphydf (#353)
- Don't try compiling code that won't without python. @iphydf (#350)
- Add buildifier lint to CI. @iphydf (#341)
- Allow format strings in fatal error messages. @iphydf (#336)
- Terminate ncurses before writing error message to stderr. @iphydf (#338)
- Treat warnings as errors in CI @robinlinden (#340)
- Remove unused macros from toxic.c @iphydf (#339)
- Add some initial unit tests for toxic. @iphydf (#334)
- Don't use cirrus cache for bazel. @iphydf (#325)
- Add and fix Wunreachable-code-return, Wunused-macros, and Wformat-nonliteral @robinlinden (#317)

## Breaking changes

- update group private message API function @JFreegman (#368)

## Features

- re-colourize the rest of logs on load @JFreegman (#342)
- hard cap the size of a session chat log to 100 MiB @JFreegman (#354)
- add config setting to set friend aliases and refactor nick fetching @JFreegman (#320)
- Add log hints and add some missing log write events @JFreegman (#333)
- re-colourize chat history on load @JFreegman (#332)
- add new tox option to enable DHT groupchat saving @JFreegman (#326)
- Allow config to be reloaded during a running session @JFreegman (#321)
- show where we're logging to with empty /log command @JFreegman (#323)
- add setting to hide the content of desktop notifications @JFreegman (#315)
- add statusbar showing topic at the top of groupchat windows @JFreegman (#313)
- when logging is enabled we now print the path being written to @JFreegman (#314)

## Bug Fixes

- make sure call control index is in-bounds for video calls @JFreegman (#365)
- message history position on resize @JFreegman (#363)
- doing a /whois on yourself no longer shows an incorrect value @JFreegman (#361)
- Remove awkward config enum and use bools for bool settings @JFreegman (#355)
- filter \t and \v escape sequences from inbound strings @JFreegman (#343)
- make sure realloc() called with a 0 value doesn't abort toxic @JFreegman (#337)
- re-add a clause accidentally removed in previous refactor @JFreegman (#330)
- regression with autocomplete behaviour @JFreegman (#328)
- friend tab names default colour now matches custom themes @JFreegman (#322)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- update group private message API function @JFreegman (#368)
- fix and reduce length of license headers @JFreegman (#367)
- More groupchat API changes @JFreegman (#352)
- Fix recent groupchat API breakage @JFreegman (#349)
- change default key-bindings for scrolling up/down @JFreegman (#312)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- properly handle invalid input for timestamp -> string conversion @JFreegman (#362)
- Don't call realloc() with size value of 0 @JFreegman (#351)
- fix some infer warnings @JFreegman (#347)
- Python API now builds again @JFreegman (#346)
- full windows implementation overhaul @JFreegman (#329)
- string arrays now contain const strings @JFreegman (#327)
- fix formatting and doc mistakes introduced in last commit @JFreegman (#319)
- fix some new compiler warnings @JFreegman (#318)
- enable some extra compile flags and clean up warnings @JFreegman (#311)

## Maintenance (Refactoring)

- Move message init queue to separate file @JFreegman (#366)
- Make some fatal memory errors non-fatal @JFreegman (#356)
- the init message queue is no longer global @JFreegman (#357)
- filter inbound strings according to type @JFreegman (#348)
- Window ID's and window creation error handling @JFreegman (#344)
- Remove awkward config enum and use bools for bool settings @JFreegman (#355)
- full windows implementation overhaul @JFreegman (#329)
- x11 focus object is no longer global @JFreegman (#310)
name: v0.14.2
